Welcome to Aroma nails and spa

Are you looking for a professional Nail Care & Spa Salon with years of experience? Come to Aroma nails and spa, our professional and passionate staff won’t let you leave until you’re fully satisfied.


Come here with us, you can choose from a range of our services such as Manicure, Pedicure, Acrylic, Gelish and more. No matter what services you choose, our professional and well-trained licensed technicians will bring you the most satisfaction ever. In addition, our top priorities are the safety & satisfaction of customers. We guarantee all of the high quality products we use have natural ingredients, and equipment is sterilized carefully. We make sure you would love your time here!

MANICURE

For everyday care, try this manicure to keep you nails healthy. Includes a nail trim, shape, buff, cuticle trim, massage, & polish, for a lovely appearance…

PEDICURE

This pampering treatment relieves stress while soothing and cooling your tired feet. Sit back & enjoy the relaxing massage of our spa pedicure chair…

NAIL ENHANCEMENT

This time, you should come to our nail salon, and all you need to do is taking a seat in our comfortable armchair and let nail salon experts rescue you from all the nail troubles!

ADDITIONAL SERVICES

Our staffs are dedicated to enhancing your salon experience and help you become more beautiful and confident…

Manicures

Classic Manicure (20 min)

$15.00

Quick and simple, the Classic manicure allows the nails and cuticles to be cut and shaped followed by a light massage and your choice of regular nail polish.

Deluxe Manicure (30 min)

$25.00

Exfoliating CND creative citrus scrub, and CND creative illuminating mask, with a warn towel wrap. Moisturizing hand massage, and your choice of polish.

Milk & Honey Manicure (35-40 min)

$35.00

Soaking with milk & honey, plus an exfoliating CND creative citrus scrub, and CND creative illuminating mask, with a warm towel wrap, special paraffin wax, moisturizing hand massage, and your choice of polish.

Gel Manicure

$30.00

Same services as the Classic manicure, but your choice of long lasting shellac color instead.

SNS Full Color (40 min)

$40.00

Organic and Long lasting, SNS nails are a popular alternative to older nail services such as solar and acrylic. Some of the benefits of this system includes reduce nail damage, short dry time, alternative nail length, and much more.

SNS with Tips

$45.00

SNS but with nail extentions to create longer nails.

SNS French

$45.00

SNS with a French Tip

Solar Full Set w/ Polish

$35.00

Classic acrylic nails with regular polish

Solar Full Set w/ Shellac

$45.00

Classic acrylic nails with Gel/Shellac polish

Solar Fill w/ Polish

$25.00

Solar Fill w/ Shellac

$35.00

Solar Cut Down or Shaping

Pedicures

Classic Pedicure (30 min)

$28.00

As the standard pedicure, it includes cutting and shaping of the nails and cuticles, callus removal, followed by a soothing massage and the polish of your choice

Deluxe Pedicure (40 min)

$40.00

upgrade and relax your tired feet with this amazing pedicure. rejuvenate with a mixture of sugar and sea salt exfoliation, callus treatment, deep penetrating mask wrapped in hot towels, followed by hot stone hydrated massage .

Runner's Pedicure(50 min)

$50.00

organic masque with your choice of four scents (Lavender, Lemongrass, Milk + Honey, or Mandarin + Mango) special paraffin wax moisturizing feet massage with organic lotion, and your choice of polish

Milk & Honey Pedicure(60 min)

$60.00

soak in milk & honey and masque with your choice of four scents (Lavender, Lemongrass, Milk + Honey, or Mandarin + Mango) special paraffin wax moisturizing feet massage with organic lotion, and your choice of polish

orange deluxe pedicure

soak in milk & honey, rejuvenating with fresh orange slices. exfoliating organic scrub, organic masque with your choice of four scents (Lavender, Lemongrass, Milk + Honey, or Mandarin + Mango) special paraffin wax moisturizing feet massage with organic lotion, and your choice of polish

Kid Manicure

the Kid manicure created especially for little ones. Includes a hand and foot soak, nail trimming and shaping, light massage and your choice of regular nail polish color or natural shiny buff and 2 nail art designs.
